nodes.text: Hutt clone troopers were clone Hutt troopers that were created by the Tarkin Initiative. Although they were rejected for wide-scale use, they were frozen in an archive aboard Hivebase-1, a secret Tarkin Initiative space station. During a mission undertaken by the Son-tuul Pride on the station, Imperial Commander Yewl unfroze the soldiers to accompany him and a group of death troopers in their capture of the group. Hutt clone troopers were outfitted with supercharged carbines.
Hutt clone troopers first appeared in the canon 2018 comic Doctor Aphra 18, written by Simon Spurrier and penciled by Emilio Laiso.
